# Task #118 - Monday.com Contact Search API - Completion Report
**Status**: COMPLETE
**Generated**: 2025-12-23 02:30 UTC
**Generated By**: Test-and-Cleanup Agent (combined workflow)

## Executive Summary
Successfully implemented the Monday.com Contact Search API feature. The implementation adds a new `search_monday_contacts()` method to the MondayService, new Pydantic schemas for search results, and a new API endpoint at `GET /api/v1/admin/monday/contacts/search`. All 914 backend tests pass, including 10 new tests for this feature.

## What Was Accomplished

### API/Backend: 5 files modified
- `backend/app/schemas/monday.py` - Added MondayContactMatch and MondayContactSearchResponse schemas (+29 lines)
- `backend/app/services/monday_service.py` - Added search_monday_contacts() and _parse_contact_from_item() methods (+129 lines)
- `backend/app/api/admin.py` - Added GET /admin/monday/contacts/search endpoint (+82 lines)
- `backend/tests/test_monday_service.py` - Added TestMondayContactSearch class with 6 tests (+173 lines)
- `backend/tests/test_monday_api.py` - Added TestMondayContactSearchSchemas class with 4 tests (+85 lines)
